item.title: Case Problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[center]Hey guys, welcome to my thread[/center]

I’ve got a problem with this case I’ve been trying to add. It’s a Herb Patch and when you ‘Guide’ it or click it, you’re supposed to get Farming experience. Everything compiles properly, I added the object etc but when I click it, it just doesn’t seem to give me Farming experience. Anyway, heres the case, please tell me if anythings wrong with it, thanks.

case 8138: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You begin raking the patch.. You gain Farming experience!"); addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 19); actionTimer = 50; setAnimation(2273); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

[i]Personally, I think somethings wrong with this part addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[2]), 19);I’m not too sure though.

Read full topic
